thumb.name: Always an Adventure! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStay Tuned.%3Cbr%3E Alex...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...for more exciting adventures%3Cbr%3Eof the Alex and Morgan show!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBeing friends with you%3Cbr%3Eis always an adventure!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Beautiful Friendship
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESandy and Terry Forever Friends 'More beautiful than all the flowers that blossom and all the stars that shine is the heart of a loving friend.'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYour friendship means the world to me!
